name: homemade-marvels-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Homemade Marvels cake websites

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:generic" "npm run dev:christmas" "npm run dev:buche"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:generic && npm run build:christmas && npm run build:buche
scripts.vercel-build: cd sites/generic && npm install && npm run build

author: Homemade Marvels
